thread.title: Man United transfer news: Jose Mourinho plans talks with Michael Carrick | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man United transfer news: Jose Mourinho plans talks with Michael Carrick | Metro News

author: Sean Kearns For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man United transfer news: Jose Mourinho plans talks with Michael Carrick | Metro News
text:
Sean Kearns for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 4:41 pm Michael Carrick is out of contract at the end of the season (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho plans to sit down with Michael Carrick to discuss the midfielder’s future at the club after this month’s EFL Cup final. 
Carrick, 35, is out of contract at the end of the season and it’s unclear whether he’ll be handed a new one-year deal at Old Trafford. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The former Tottenham midfielder didn’t start a league game until November this term but United have a 72% win percentage with Carrick in the side. 
The Red Devils face St Etienne in the Europa League before an FA Cup clash with Blackburn on Sunday and Mourinho is keen not to have any distractions before the side’s EFL Cup final clash with Southampton on February 26th.
